effect: Steals the target's held item when the Pokémon hits with a damaging move (if the user is not already holding an item).
synergies: Fast or multi-hit Pokémon (e.g., Delphox, Hoopa)
Moves that make contact or have multiple hits
notes: Only works if the user has no held item prior to the attack. Does not activate if the target has no item or the move is non-damaging.
